column4: Number of incidents per bias motivation

column1: 1 The data in this addendum were recieved after the publication deadline for Hate Crime Statistics, 2012.  Therefore, they are not included in either aggregate tables or in agency tables in the annual hate crime report for 2012.

2 Agencies published in this table indicated that at least one hate crime incident occurred in their respective jurisdictions during the quarter(s) for which they submitted a report to the Hate Crime Statistics Program.  Blanks indicate quarters for which agencies did not submit reports.

3 Population figures are published only for the cities.  The figures listed for the universities and colleges are student enrollment and were provided by the United States Department of Education for the 2011 school year, the most recent available.  The enrollment figures include full-time and part-time students.
